sentences.sContent: This is me at school in December.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is me at school in December.
sentences.sCn: 这就是十二月在学校中的我。

sentences.sContent: In winter, there are December, January and.
sentences.sContent_eng: In winter, there are December, January and.
sentences.sCn: 在冬季，有十二月，一月和二月。 。

trans.tranOther: the 12th month of the year, between November and January
